findings.title: Denial of Service Vectors
findings.description: The handling of large JSON payload and lack of rate limit on oracle operations can lead to denial of service attacks.

findings.title: Inconsistencies in the circuit breaker design
findings.description: Circuit breaker inconsistencies can lead to system instability and unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Lack of certificate pinning support
findings.description: The Oracle Client lacks support for certificate pinning which can lead to security vulnerabilities.
